title: Jongo Trio - Same (1972) MP3@320
description:
A very groovy bossa-album from 1972...

The trio's approach is similar to that of the more famous Tamba Trio Ã¢â‚¬â€œ in that the three members groove on keyboards, bass, and percussion Ã¢â‚¬â€œ while also harmonizing vocals in a soaring, airy style that really adds a lot to the set. The set includes a really great uptempo version of "Aguas De Marco", plus the tracks "Alo Feveiro", "Quem Vem La", "Cavaleiro De Aruanda", "Sandalia De Prata", "Bate Barriga", "Feitinha P'Ro Poeta", and "Duas Contas"."
